casebody.data:
No. 10-6314. LaVern Berryhill, Petitioner v. Frank Howell Seay, Judge, United States District Court for the Eastern District of Oklahoma, et al. 562 U.S. 998, 131 S. Ct. 554,

178 L. Ed. 2d 366,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8345. November 1, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
